I am Taimur Khan, a Data Scientist at the [Helmholtz-Center for Environmental Research (UFZ)](https://www.ufz.de/index.php?en=33573) in the [BioDT](https://biodt.eu ) project. Combining advances in computation and ecological science, I aim to create Digital Twin systems that can replicate the Earth's dynamic systems using modern methods in data engineering, data-driven software engineering, and statistical modelling. I am also a part-time Master's student at the University of Leipzig, studying Earth System Data Science and Remote Sensing.
